title: But you're a girl
creator_credit: Sue Johnston, Julie Ruth and Royal Melbourne Institute of Technology
brief_description: Shows some of the areas girls have traditionally worked in are no longer certain providers of jobs and then goes on to look at other job options such as trades, apprenticeships and traditionally male dominated professions. Indicates that is is possible for girls and young women to enter these areas, do well in them and enjoy them.
